bug.author: honnibal
bug.summary: ðŸ’« Doc.from_array() is missing support for some Token attributes
bug.description:
Currently the doc.from_array() method only supports a few token attributes. It's missing support for e.g. TAG, LEMMA, and others. It also fails with a confusing error if given an ORTH value. <denchmark-h:h2>Details</denchmark-h>
Difficulty: easy / suitable for new contributors Implementation: tokens/doc.pyx#L466 Tests: tests/doc/test_doc_api.py Related issues: #815, #731
<denchmark-h:h3>Relevant docs</denchmark-h>
API: Doc.to_array() Workflow: spaCy's data model TODO: Setting lexical attributes (see #581)

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
